fusion_info: We are excited to introduce you to the next chapter of our very own FusionCMS. Years have passed since the initial release, and the system has improved with each version. The core of this CMS is powered by clean, object-oriented PHP code, maintained by the incredibly powerful CodeIgniter 4 framework. We also ensure to amaze your visitors with more JavaScript-powered live interactions than ever before.
what_need: What do I need to run this system?
extensions_required_php: The following PHP extensions are required
enable_extensions: How do I enable PHP extensions?
recommend_apache: We recommend using FusionCMS with an Apache web server.
apache_required: The Apache modules you'll need are
enable_modules: How do I enable Apache modules?
description_tip: Description: Best World of Warcraft private server in the entire world!
keywords_tip: Search Engine Keywords (separated by commas): world of warcraft, wow, private server, pvp
max_expansion_detail: Choose the highest expansion for your server
site_key_detail: Use this in the HTML code your site serves to users.
secret_key_detail: Use this for communication between your site and Google. Be sure to keep it a secret.
cdn_detail: Use a content delivery network for JavaScript libraries (only disable it for LAN-only environments)
auth_config_detail: Settings related to Realmd/Logon/Auth database and account password encryption.
account_encryption_detail:
SRP6: Select this for most modern emulators (with salt and verifier columns in auth.accounts table).
SPH: Select this for older emulators (with sha_pass_hash column in auth.accounts table).
SRP: Mostly for cMangos and vMangos emulators.
rbac_detail: Set to yes for emulators that have RBAC tables.
battle_net_detail: Set to yes for emulators that have the auth.battlenet_accounts table.
battle_net_encryption_detail:
SRP6 (V1 / V2): Select this for most modern emulators (with salt and verifier columns in auth.battlenet_accounts table).
SPH: Select this for older emulators (with sha_pass_hash column in auth.battlenet_accounts table).
totp_secret_detail: Set to yes for emulators that have the token_key or totp_secret column in the auth.account table.
totp_secret_name_detail:
totp_secret: Select this for most modern emulators (with totp_secret column in auth.account table).
token_key: Select this for older emulators (with token_key column in auth.account table).
realms_detail: If you want to add multiple realms, add all your realms first and then configure them. You can also add only one realm and configure others via the admin panel afterwards.
emulator_detail: Please choose the correct emulator for your realm.
realm_expansion: Expansion (Choose the expansion of this realm)
realm_expansion_detail: Choose the expansion of this realm
console_settings_detail_1: Required for emulators that use remote console systems.
console_settings_detail_2: For an in-game account with a GM level high enough to connect to your emulator console remotely (see your emulator's config files for more details)
console_port: Console Port (usually 3443 for RA and 7878 for SOAP)
